name.title: Accessory Name
name.description: The name of this accessory as it will appear in HomeKit.

cities.title: Cities to Monitor

oneOf.title: Abu Qrenat and the Bedouin Diaspora
Abu Talul and the Bedouin Diaspora
Umm Batin and the Bedouin Diaspora
Afek and Lev Ha"aretz Industrial area

Ashdod - Northern Industrial area and port
Ashdod - Het, Tet, Yod, Yod Gimmel, Yod Dalet, Tet Zain
Ashdod - Yod Alef, Yod Bet, Tet Vav, Yod Zain, Marina, City

cities.description: Select one or more cities (in Hebrew) to monitor for alerts. Leave empty to monitor all cities.

useChromecast.title: Enable Chromecast
useChromecast.description: Enable or disable sending alert notifications to Chromecast devices.

chromecastVolume.title: Default Chromecast Volume
chromecastVolume.description: Default volume level for Chromecast devices (0-100).

chromecastTimeout.title: Chromecast Timeout (seconds)
chromecastTimeout.description: Fallback: How many seconds to consider an alert active if the Chromecast does not report playback finished.

chromecastVolumes.title: Per-Chromecast Device Volume Overrides

deviceName.title: Chromecast Device Name
deviceName.description: Friendly name of the Chromecast device.

chromecastVolumes.description: Optional: Set specific default and per-alert-type volume levels for individual Chromecast devices.

alerts.title: Alert Types Configuration

enabled.title: Enable Early Warning
enabled.description: Enable or disable Early Warning alerts.

startHour.title: Start Hour
startHour.description: Hour (0-23) to begin Early Warning alerts.

endHour.title: End Hour
endHour.description: Hour (0-23) after which Early Warning alerts are suppressed.

volume.title: Early Warning Volume
volume.description: Default volume for Early Warning alerts (0-100).

enabled.title: Enable Flash Shelter
enabled.description: Enable or disable Flash Shelter alerts.

startHour.title: Start Hour
startHour.description: Hour (0-23) to begin Flash Shelter alerts.

endHour.title: End Hour
endHour.description: Hour (0-23) after which Flash Shelter alerts are suppressed.

volume.title: Flash Shelter Volume
volume.description: Default volume for Flash Shelter alerts (0-100).

enabled.title: Enable Exit Notification
enabled.description: Enable or disable Exit Notification alerts.

startHour.title: Start Hour
startHour.description: Hour (0-23) to begin Exit Notification alerts.

endHour.title: End Hour
endHour.description: Hour (0-23) after which Exit Notification alerts are suppressed.

volume.title: Exit Notification Volume
volume.description: Default volume for Exit Notification alerts (0-100).

alerts.description: Configure time, enable, and volume for each alert type.

wsUrl.title: WebSocket URL
wsUrl.description: WebSocket URL for real-time Red Alert API. The default should be fine for most users.

reconnectInterval.title: WebSocket Reconnect Interval (ms)
reconnectInterval.description: How often (in milliseconds) to attempt reconnection to the WebSocket if disconnected.

serverPort.title: Media Server Port
serverPort.description: Port to use for the HTTP media server serving alert videos to Chromecast.

alertVideoPath.title: Alert Video Path
alertVideoPath.description: Path (relative to media directory) to the video file for primary alerts.

earlyWarningVideoPath.title: Early Warning Video Path
earlyWarningVideoPath.description: Path (relative to media directory) to the video file for early warnings.

flashAlertShelterVideoPath.title: Flash Shelter Video Path
flashAlertShelterVideoPath.description: Path (relative to media directory) to the video file for 'stay near shelter' warnings.

exitNotificationVideoPath.title: Exit Notification Video Path
exitNotificationVideoPath.description: Path (relative to media directory) to the video file for exit notifications.

testVideoPath.title: Test Video Path
testVideoPath.description: Path (relative to media directory) to the video file for test alerts.
